revised_title: A Magnetic Survey of the Fortieth Parallel in North America: Observations and Analysis
tldr: This article details a magnetic survey conducted along the 40th parallel in North America, from the Atlantic Ocean to the Great Salt Lake in Utah. The author, T.E. Thorpe, provides a comprehensive overview of the instruments used, the observations made, and the analysis of the data collected. The study aims to contribute to the understanding of the magnetic history of the continent and the potential impact of secular changes on the magnetic field.
